article_title: Walton County activates cold weather shelters for Sunday
article_text:
Walton County Emergency Management has activated Cold Weather Emergency Shelters for Walton County Sunday evening, January 3, 2016. The following cold weather emergency shelters will be open beginning at 5:30 p.m.

Coastal Branch Library

437 Greenway Trail

Santa Rosa Beach, FL 32459

DeFuniak Springs Community Center

361 North 10th Street

DeFuniak Springs, Florida 32433

The National Weather Service predicts a temperature of below 40°F in Walton County. Freezing temperatures are possible late tonight through Monday morning, January 4, 2016.

Call Walton County Emergency Management at (850) 951-2017 if you have any questions.
